Description: Glazed composition hemispherical bowl; mould-made; rounded base, straight rim with rounded top; two incised lines below rim exterior; exterior pale blue to white with dark brown at rim, interior yellow; glaze quite well preserved; one side of rim chipped.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Enkomi
Bibliographic references: Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (P35, Fig 63)
